title: 106 74 14 "Caged!""The Trap of Certain Defeat! Storming Raindinners!"Transliteration: "Zettai zetsumei no wana! Reindināzu totsunyū" (Japanese:絶体絶命の罠!レインディナーズ突入) Hidehiko Kadota Michiru Shimada March 24, 2002(2002-03-24)[43] July 1, 2006[44][45]
